io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.world2d

Class WorldState

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.newdawn.slick.state.BasicGameState
      • io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.world2d.WorldState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BaseScaleState, org.newdawn.slick.ControlledInputReciever, org.newdawn.slick.ControllerListener, org.newdawn.slick.InputListener, org.newdawn.slick.KeyListener, org.newdawn.slick.MouseListener, org.newdawn.slick.state.GameState
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    WorldEditor

    public class WorldState
extends org.newdawn.slick.state.BasicGameState
implements BaseScaleState
    A state for rendering worlds
    Author:
    Tomaso2468

      • expandTexture

        protected void expandTexture(TileTexture t,
                             java.util.List<TileTexture> l,
                             long x,
                             long y,
                             long z,
                             World world,
                             Tile tile,
                             java.lang.String state)
        Expands a single tile texture into all its subtextures.
        Parameters:
        t - The texture to expand.
        l - The list to expand into.
        x - The tile X position.
        y - The tile Y position.
        z - The tile Z position.
        world - The current world.
        tile - The current tile.
        state - The tile's current state.

        world - The current world.
